评论详情: This top fits me to perfection! I wore it on a first date with my new boyfriend who is a professional photographer so lucky me I have such a gorgeous photo of myself wearing this! Highly recommend this top!
Runs small.  But just for us busty girls.  The embroidery is very pretty and nicely done. I’m very happy with it.
Beautiful blouse!  Well-made and gorgeous!
This fits beautifully, is very flattering, and the embroidery is lovely.

I bought three (3) of these shirts.  The fit seemed true to size and not larger as per the description.  One reviewer complained about the short lining, but that is to cover the embroidery so it is not rough against your skin.  Nice touch I thought.  The two black shirts were beautiful.  The gray one had some awful rough polyester scrim as a lining half way down both back and front.  Sent that one back.  Guess you take your chances on which colors they use that yucky fabric
The cloth was very inferior and smelled like skunk spray. Opened it in my car to wear later and regretted it. Washed it and it smelled still.
Not what was expected. Wrinkles and cheap looking.

I bought this as a top for a Halloween costume and picked the design because I thought I would wear it again. The fabric is soft and comfortable, and the fit is true to size. Nice quality on the embroidery!

These blouses are very nice for the price, but not all "medium" sized tops are the same size. The dark teal Medium I bought is enormous (but I'm assuming it will shrink some), but the black Medium was sort of tight. A Medium always seems to fit me in just about anything, but just be aware that the sizing is inconsistent. Nice blouses, though.

This was hail Mary buy. No other top was fitting well for my 70's reunion party. I ordered this with no time to spare. It fit great, not like a sack but with just enough fit over my hips. I only had time to steam out wrinkles and go. It's a little thin material, I imagine it may not was well...? and have quite a few wrinkles but my hand held steamer worked VERY well getting out the package folded creases so it will most likely do the same after washing. I am overall pleased with the top. It's just a bit delicately thin material.
Over pants comfort

评论概述: Nice fabric/color, but style not flattering - refund took weeks!
评论详情: The positive: the garment looks great in the photos. The fabric is soft and feels nice, the embroidery is well done. I ordered the red color and it is very pretty - on the hanger.  The negative: 1) The fit is not flattering - the way the style fit on me, at least, I looked like I was expecting a baby. Ugh. A smaller size would have been too tight across the shoulders/arms. So - pretty, but not a good choice. I decided to return the blouse immediately.  2) I had checked on the return policy; it was the standard "free returns for any reason within 30 days." I did the return online in my account, dropped off the package as directed at the UPS store, and then ..... I waited.  I got NO confirmation from Amazon. Status in my account showed only that the seller was "waiting for item to be dropped off". I chatted with an Amazon online rep who kept saying, "you will surely get your refund." but could not confirm that the blouse was indeed accepted. I messaged the seller, who told me to contact Amazon for help.  And there the status remained, for almost 4 weeks. Finally, a refund was suddenly issued to my account, so I did get my money back.  However -- buyer beware.

评论概述: Not for bigger chests or arms
评论详情: I read a bunch of reviews saying that this was true to size, and mine must have been defective because that was absolutely not true. I ordered a 2XL for it to have a comfier fit, and the shirt was sooo tight! My arms were so constricted and I could barely get it over my chest. I’m not even sure if sizing up would have helped. The material is just not forgiving.
Fit was extremely tight, hard to get off. The quality and workman ship of the embroidery was great. I wish I could’ve kept it.
Beautiful fabric, design and color. Received many compliments.

评论概述: Love the look of this top.
评论详情: Colors are vivid.  Have had many compliments when wearing. Size runs true as in tops I usually wear a 10 and I ordered this in a medium. I have not yet washed, therefore I didn’t mark with 5 stars. After washing I will reevaluate the rating.  It’s a great buy - get it!

评论概述: Es miy bonita y le sirvió a la persona.
评论详情: No he comprado más esta camisa, esa la compre hace un año para mi hermana y por supuesto la califique. No se porque están preguntando ahora.
Wife liked it.
Comfortable fit, the color is very bright but I like that
Love the shirt!  Great quality and beautiful colors

I ordered an XL and it was perfect. I am 5' 4" and at the time was heavy at 170, but this was still very flattering and hid what I wanted to hide. The lining is super nice and the whole shirt is comfy.
This shrunk so badly! Hand washed in cold water using laundress delicate. I am so sad! I LOVE this! it's hanging up right now to dry but I'll have to  to return it.
I found this blouse to be not just pretty, but comfortable. I get many compliments on the bright colors. I will probably wear it for dia de los muertos, but every day is this far has been great.
Nice fabric. It is lined which keeps the embroidery from touching the skin and makes it opaque. Nice touch. The liner is a little smaller than the blouse though so size appropriately.
This is a one of a kind item the stitching is fabulous Thank - You to The Seller and Amazon

评论概述: if you like blouses larger then order the size up.  It's a 2X and fits perfect
评论详情: Love, love love this blouse.  Wish the color (brown) would be a  bit more lighter. It's very very dark brown.  I can't wait to iron it tonight wearing it tomorrow!!!

This shirt is an odd fit. Very low armhole make it look sloppier than I imagined. I would have sent it back if I didn’t know how to sew. I was able to alter it for a better fit but it was a lot of extra work for an already expensive blouse.

评论概述: Sadly, too small for a 50 inch bust :(
评论详情: The embroidery is gorgeous. The lining inside is nicely done and a great feature. Very sad the arms are tight and it's not cut wide enough in the front for a bustline, and the underarms pull like they don't have enough cut out, meaning no reaching forward, so I can't enjoy this. I'm a curvy girl even though I am bigger and this isn't cut for me.
Beautiful embroidery, but will shrink one full size after wash and dry.  I ordered one size up and now fits perfectly !!!
I bought this as a gift for my mother in law. I went by the measurements, but it was to small. So she returned it.

The top is well-made in a light rayon material. Has a short liner in the bra area so not see through. Embroidery is machine done, but very pretty. I recommend hand wash ONLY since rayon can shrink. Nice purchase!
Love the shirt and when I tried it on, fit great with some extra room. Hand washed, and hung to dry, and I lost about an inch and a half in length!!!!
I washed according to the instructions and yet it shrunk

Love this top!!  Super soft and comfortable. Embroidery detail is outstanding.  Fits loose but true to size. Bought this for a costume but will wear often.  Great purchase! Would definitely buy in other colors.

评论概述: This is a beautiful shirt.  Gorgeous fabric, light, well made.
评论详情: Beautiful shirt.  Well made, could dress up or dress down.
I like it . I’m 5’2, 135 pounds . It hits below my hips which I like .
Fits great. Looks good. It’s not Johnny Was but it has the same fashion look. Got 2 colors. Red and brown. Always get compliments.
So cute!
Overrated,  cheap material reeks of low quality. Definitely not worth the price listed.

评论概述: I should have got a medium
评论详情: I don't know what I was thinking by getting a small. I am 5' 4", 145 pounds, 34B and 31 waist.  I guess I was trying to not have to tuck the top into my jeans because I really don't like tucking shirts in due to my front gut, yet I wanted to still still show a little shape in my rear and thighs by having a shorter shirt.  I didn't think about how the rest of the shirt gets smaller too when it gets shorter and less baggy. 🙃🙄  It fits just enough to wear it out, but only if I act like a lady and don't move too much or lift anything or raise my arms above my head. I should have got a medium.  I love the embroidery and the v neck is not too low. It is very soft and pretty. It has a nice but tighter cami sewn into it on the inside. So it feels even tighter than it looks on me because I have to feel the smaller cami against my body while the world sees the larger flowing outer top. Not cheap feeling.  If I don't ever wash it, I might be able to get a couple wears out of it before it shrinks. Wash by hand in cold water is what I will do. As it is, it just barely fits in shoulder and chest. Arms are fine.  The video was a mistake, but it shows the top in real life so I included it. (Hubby was trying to take photos of the jeans for me.)

This is a beautiful shirt, I got my usual size large and it fit good and it’s comfortable to wear but I do wish it were longer, I’m 5’9” and it’s shorter then I would like. I washed on gentle cold cycle and hung to dry, it’s a thin rayon and it came out lightly wrinkled but acceptable, I wouldn’t iron it, the embroidery would look puckered. It looks fine though, it’s a very pretty top and the colors are really vivid and didn’t bleed or fade. I own several of these tops, I prefer the black, it is more forgiving hiding wrinkles then the white ones and you can’t see through it. It is true to size, I like the 3/4 sleeve, great for showing off beautiful turquoise bracelets and they don’t get in your way. This is a really beautiful top, I would recommend it but if you are tall it is a bit short.

I’ve recently tried to expand my wardrobe from the “always matching” blacks, whites, grays and browns to something with colors or patterns. Just to spice things up a little.  I saw this shirt with both patterns and colors and had to get it!  The material is light, so it’ll be cool this spring. The material doesn’t stretch much. The shirt does flow naturally.  As for comfort, I’ve worn more comfortable clothing (most of my clothes have some stretch or flexibility in them), but this shirt is loose enough it doesn’t bind. There is plenty of room.  I love the colors, the shirt is soft, and wearing it makes me feel good. So I’m happy with my order.

评论概述: Looks nice and fits well but the liner is too short.
评论详情: The is a pretty short and the embroidery is beautiful. It says machine-wash, but I'm nervous how long the embroidery will hold up. I tried my regular size (XL) and it fits well. My only complaint is there is a liner in the shirt that only goes half way down the shirt. I tried the white color which is somewhat see-through, so the liner looks a little weird. I think wearing a white tank top underneath would help with this, but it would be better if the liner went to full length of the shirt. This probably would not be a problem with the darker colors available.

评论概述: I feel elegant, comfortable and chic with this top.
评论详情: Higustar Bohemian Embroidered Tops for Women Mexican Peasant Style 3/4 Sleeve Shirts: This is a very nice looking blouse. The embroidery is beautiful and helps set the tone of elegance in the design of this top. The contrasting colors are vibrant and pretty. I do not look at all like the model on the pictures yet I feel an air of casual elegance while wearing it. I'm in my mid 40s, 200 lbs  5"4' and still I feel really good while wearing it. On top of that the fabric is very soft. The only thing I do not love is lining; it is not cotton or breathable but even in this Florida summer weather I have worn it three times and I feel good. This is probably because the lining is more on the style of a camisole and the blouse itself is very flowy and loose. I washed it in the normal cycle with tap water temperature and dried in the normal cycle and there was no shrinkage. I wore it with some elastic skinny type pants and sandals. Pretty lovely blouse that would make a nice gift.

评论概述: Fully Lined, Super Comfy, Perfect Fit!!!
评论详情: Gorgeous top quality Embroidered Mexican top!!!  I got the White and it is Not transparent, you can't see through it, it has a Super soft white lining that feels silky soft against your skin and covers the back of the hand embroidery so it doesn't itch you!!!  Although this fits perfectly and is Super comfy and looks Very Expensive, it is very 'boxy' and does nothing for your figure, the best way to wear it is tucked Into jeans, skirt or slacks!!  Worth every penny and really beautiful, it is clear this is a Classy Top!!!  Thank you!!!

This is a nice quality black rayon loose fitting blouse. The black is a nice deep black and the material is very soft. It also has a rayon lining on the front panel to protect the embroidery from rubbing on your skin but it is not noticeable when wearing. The embroidery thread is delicate, soft and the colors are vibrant. Looks well made. I am happy with the purchase.  I generally wear a size 4 and am about 5’ tall so ordered in a small. It does seem to run on the large size, I would consider it more of a medium fit. It will be a good addition to my wardrobe when the weather warms up as it looks like it will not show sweat stains and will remain cool because of the loose fit. I like the black because it can be dressed up or down depending on what you wear with it.  The blouse care instructions are however inconsistent; both saying it can be machine washed and that it should be hand washed and not rung dry. My opinion, because of the embroidery, it should only be hand washed. I did consider giving it a lower rating because of large fit and the embroidery design on the sleeve does not go all the way around the arm, which I think looks unfinished, but this may not bother others.

Beautiful top. Runs a tad large. If between sizes definitely size down. I usually order a large in tops from amazon because I find they usually run small, but the medium fit perfectly. Also don’t be afraid of the white - the top is lined!

评论概述: Fit great until I washed it
评论详情: I really like this bright and fun top for the summer. Only issue is it shrunk so much after first wash. Like it but recommend low heat in dryer or air dry.

评论概述: Looks beautiful just as pictured and can put in dryer
评论详情: I'm not good hanging clothes dry and neither are my family members who take turns doing laundry. Every piece of clothing will end up in the dryer one way of another.  I got a Large, wore it a couple of times, washed and dried.  No color fading or major shrinking.  The embroidery is beautiful so this top can be dressed up or down.

评论概述: Casual Yet Dressy Yet Hippie … and Not See Through!
评论详情: I’ve owned similar shirts in my (relative) youth and never minded the ummm… transparency, particularly for evening wear.  But I hadn’t realized I’d been limiting myself to either just evenings or “it’s so dam* hot nobody care especially me.”  This shirt has a very nice liner that I can even tuck into my pants/skirt/shorts to get just a bit of that sexy see-through.  I love me some bright colors and these don’t disappoint. I will probably be hauling this along to Mexico with me next month for the added sun protection and comfort in the Mazatlan humidity.  It’s fabric feels the same as my older shirts and I expect it will also last me a good long time (I hang mine to dry.). I hope you enjoy  yours as much as I do mine!

评论概述: Gorgeous lightweight shirt with beautiful embroidery, peasant style and true to size. 100% cotton.
评论详情: I love this beautiful white embroidered shirt. It's made of 100% cotton, which I haven't seen in any of the other tops I've ordered except a blue one that's similar to this.  I'd call this more bohemian than a "hippie shirt," but whatever. The fabric is very, very comfortable, the craftsmanship is excellent, and the fit is excellent. I love the 3/4 sleeves so I can wear it longer.  This shirt is lightweight and extremely soft and comfortable. That's what 100% cotton fabric will do for you.  Excellent product made of 100% cotton, a nice change, fits true to size, beautiful fabric and embroidery. You can't go wrong with this shirt. It's cool and comfortable.

I really love the look and feel of this peasant blouse. It's made of thin (cotton?) and there is a second layer of fabric on the chest so it won't be too sheer. The length and fit are generously loose, but the armholes extend too low, and only hit me right when I hoist the material up at my shoulders. I think it is designed for a taller person with large shoulders. I think I would have to take it in at least 3" at the shoulder to make it fit well.

I love this top! I bought it in white, and the contrast of the background with the colorful embroidery is beautiful. The fit is a little boxy but overall as pictured. The fabric is also lightweight, so I've been comfortable wearing this even in the summer in Texas. Great piece to have!

I was kind of surprised at how well made this top is. Stitching was great, and the embroidery looked perfect! This is a very pretty top, and if you’re a plus lady, you can see how well this will do the job to camouflage. It’s also cut long enough in the back to cover the rear. It seems like a fine washable, the tag said hand wash and line dry….okay, it needs a little extra care, but the top is well worth the money and well made.

I like the color and design of this beautiful Higustar: bohemian embroidered top for women. It has a Mexican peasant style, 3/4 sleeve shirt. Boho summer tunics blouses, sexy v-neck, high quality rayon, gorgeous embroidery loose fit, beautiful floral pattern, beautiful stylish summer top. I recommend.
Looks great. US size fit.  As advertised and pictured. Love it.

A very attractive retro looking blouse. The material is light weight. The stitching on the embroidery looks tight and precise. The fit is comfortable and feels nice against the skin. My wife loves this top, says she can pair it with jeans or shorts with no problem. P-)
The detailed embroidery work is very lovely.  The material itself has a silky feel and is double layered.  It’s thin and will be good for all seasons.  The seams are well made and color done well.

I enjoyed wearing this and received numerous compliments as I went around running errands.  The fabric has a soft texture and is lightweight and comfortable.  The seams are flawless and the garment appears well made.

This shirt is a nice true to size fit and it's made of comfortable material too! It can be styled sooo many ways which is another reason why I love it. I definitely wouldn't size down in this top especially if you have wide shoulders like I do.
Lightweight to wear and comfortable, I love the embroidery more now that it's in my hands.  Fit is very good, blouse was impeccably made and I am very happy.

I love the cute, style, fit and material of this top. Its quite cute and not basic at all. I am 5'6" 135lbs and 36B and ordered a medium and it fit me perfectly. I recommend this top if you don't like basic shirts.
It runs small so I sized up. I'm an XL and this is a 2xl. Very pretty and made well. Has a lining so it's not see-through. Beautiful lightweight top!

This shirt is soft and lightweight. This is my favorite loose fit.  It covers my belly and makes me look good. The embroidery is beautiful. The color of the embroidery goes well with the black of the shirt. I like the 3/4 sleeve. They are convenient and they can protect my arms from sun.
This item is so comfortable and easy fit. I got so many compliments from everyone! It is light weight for a summer day. I highly recommend this item.
Not true to size ran very short/ small. Had to return.

评论概述: I had to order a XXXL and it is still tight across the chest
评论详情: Ok, first off...no woman wants to have to order sizes larger than what she truly is...NO WOMAN. I first ordered this shirt in a XXL, it should have fit with room to spare...nope, it didn't. So I ordered it a full size larger. This time it fits, I can wear it, but it is still a little tight through the shoulders...if this shrinks up at all, it won't fit either. The cut of this top is simply WRONG, you have to be a very narrow-shouldered woman to wear this top.  It's just not one I can recommend after my experience trying to find one that truly fits...because I still haven't, and I won't, not with the cut being off.
It's a little bit for my size, but it's very nice!! Will order again!!
Love this shirt it's so cute!!! And fits great!!
Lined for nice lie.
This shirt is so comfortable and soft. The embroidery is absolutely beautiful.
Very nice pattern vibrant colors fits well

评论概述: I bought this blouse in three colors!
评论详情: After purchasing one, I bought two more! They're soft, wash up lovely, needing a small pressing.

评论概述: This top is beautiful and fits great.
评论详情: This top is beautiful and fits great.
This is a beautiful shirt and receive a compliment from absolutely everyone!  It fits perfectly and I just love it.  You have to be willing to iron, but I am so doesn't bother me a bit.  Five Stars!
